title: United States
fact: The United States is the third largest country by land area and population.

title: France
fact: France is famous for its cuisine, art, and the Eiffel Tower.

title: Japan
fact: Japan is made up of over 6,800 islands and is known for its technology and culture.

title: Brazil
fact: Brazil is the largest country in South America and home to the Amazon rainforest.

title: Australia
fact: Australia is both a country and a continent, famous for its unique wildlife.

title: India
fact: India is the second most populous country and has a rich cultural history.

title: Canada
fact: Canada is the second largest country by land area and is known for its natural beauty.

title: Egypt
fact: Egypt is famous for its ancient civilization and the iconic pyramids.
